views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13 (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

SiriOpenHelpConfirm is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Enable the Open Help and Suggestions Confirmation Alert when using the Keyboard to Interact with Siri!

You have to enable the Feature on Settings, General, Accessibility, Siri and Write to.

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository.

If you Have got My Repo Version, Just Uninstall it and Install this New One for getting Further Updates.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
